projects.name: Unihawk.com

projects.name: Bigjack.fun
projects.description: Worked on developing a user-friendly interface and enhancing overall user experience.

experiences.description: Collaborated with senior developers to design, develop, and deploy new features for a travel booking platform. Enhanced functionality by integrating various APIs, ensuring seamless data exchange and communication. Implemented backend functionalities using Nest.js and MySQL, focusing on data integrity and user experience. Optimized website performance, reducing loading times by 20% through strategic code optimization and caching. Engaged in code reviews, providing constructive feedback and maintaining high coding standards. Resolved technical issues, contributing to improved user satisfaction and system reliability.

Contributed to the development of UniHawk's study abroad website, designing pages and implementing data-fetching functionalities. Utilized Laravel for backend tasks and MySQL for database integration. Worked on additional projects involving Node.js and Express for API development. Conducted research on emerging technologies to stay ahead in the field. Employed Git for version control, ensuring efficient project management and collaboration.
